app.config
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration>
  <configSections>
    <section name="paths"
             type="Cavity.Configuration.PathConfigurationSection, Cavity.Core" />
  </configSections>
  <paths configSource="paths.config" />
</configuration>
}}}

paths.config
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<paths>
  <directories>
    <add name="temp" directory="C:\Temp" />
  </directories>
  <files>
    <add name="example" file="C:\example.txt" />
  </files>
</paths>
}}}
